sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_workflow_model ( id char(32) not null, modelname varchar(64) not null, modeltext varchar(128), status int2 not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, processcount int4 not null, unique(modelname), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_process ( id char(32) not null, modelid char(32) not null, modelname varchar(64) not null, title varchar(128), version varchar(16) not null, status int2 not null, userid char(32), deptid char(32), domainid varchar(32), usertext varchar(32), createdate timestamp not null, roleid char(32), completedate timestamp, properties text, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_delegation ( id char(32) not null, delegationsource int2 not null, sourceid char(32) not null, status int2 not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, startdate timestamp, completedate timestamp, dstartdate timestamp, dcompletedate timestamp, rulehandler varchar(128), description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_activity ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, previousid char(32), tasknodeid char(32) not null, tasknodetext varchar(64) not null, tasknodetype int2 not null, status int2 not null, createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, timeoutdate timestamp, properties text, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_workitem ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, activityid char(32) not null, status int2 not null, roleid char(32) not null, deptid char(32), userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, userid2 char(32) not null, usertext2 varchar(32), createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, readmark bool not null, topmark bool not null, retakeref char(32), ext1 varchar(64), ext2 int4 not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable ( id char(32) not null, variablesource int2 not null, sourceid char(32) not null, variablename varchar(32) not null, stringvalue varchar(128), clobvalue text, unique(variablesource, sourceid, variablename), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable_log ( id char(32) not null, variableid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, stringvalue varchar(128), clobvalue text, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_comment ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, workitemid char(32) not null, deptid char(32) not null, taskname varchar(64) not null, ccomment text not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_comment_log ( id char(32) not null, commentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, logtype int2 not null, ccomment text not null, primary key(id) );
